parameters.name: JodId
parameters.description: The job ID. For more information about how to query the job ID, see [ListJob](~~459676~~).

parameters.name: TensorboardId
parameters.description: The ID of the TensorBoard instance. For more information about how to obtain the ID of the TensorBoard instance, see [ListTensorboards](~~459689~~).

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: The information about the shared token. You can specify this parameter to obtain the permission to view a TensorBoard job based on the shared token information. You can execute [GetTensorboardSharedUrl](~~2557813~~) and extract the shared token from the obtained information.
